question:
Which of the following statements is/are correct as per the Economic Survey 2017-18?
  1. The average retail inflation has declined in 2017-18 (April-December) compared to corresponding period of the previous year
  2. The average Wholesale Price Index (WPI) inflation in 2017-18 (April-December) has increased compared to corresponding period during the previous year
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. As per the economic-survey, the average retail inflation has declined to a six-year low of 3.3 percent in 2017-18. <u>Second statement is correct</u>. The average Wholesale Price Index (WPI) inflation in the 2017-18 has increased compared to corresponding period in the previous year.
